players.name: Alice
memory: Charlie: "Bob is the mafioso I investigated last night and he's a threat to us. We need to vote him out."
Bob: "I have no information to share at this time, but I agree that we need to be vigilant and work together as a team."
Bob: "I have no reason to suspect anyone at the moment, but we need to remain vigilant and work together as a team. Let's focus on gathering more information before making any decisions."
